Package com.example.demo.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
com.example.demo.controller.AdminController
@Controller public class AdminController extends Object
The AdminController class handles web requests related to admin functionalities such as login, password reset, and password change. It interacts with the AdminService to perform these operations and returns appropriate views based on the request.

  • Method Details

    • login

      @GetMapping("/login") public String login(@RequestParam(value="error",required=false) String error, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the login page. If an error parameter is present, an error message is added to the model.
      Parameters:
      error - an optional parameter indicating if there was an error during login.
      model - used to add attributes to the model.
      Returns:
      the "Login" view.

    • resetPassword

      @GetMapping("/admin/resetPassword") public String resetPassword()
      Displays the password reset page.
      Returns:
      the "ResetPassword" view.

    • changePassword

      @PostMapping("/changePassword") public String changePassword(Admin adminNewPassword, String confirmPassword, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Handles the password change request. If the password change is successful, a success message is added to the model and the user is redirected to the admin home page. If unsuccessful, the user is redirected back to the password reset page.
      Parameters:
      adminNewPassword - contains the new password information for the admin.
      confirmPassword - the confirmation password entered by the user.
      model - used to add attributes to the model.
      Returns:
      redirects to either "AdminHomePage" or "ResetPassword" based on the outcome.

    • adminHomePage

      @GetMapping("/admin/homePage") public String adminHomePage()
      Displays the admin home page.
      Returns:
      the "AdminHomePage" view.
